channel.description:
[center][b]►SalusScape 317◄ Oldschool RSPS - Zulrah Items/Bosses - Iron Man Mode[/b]
[img]http://i62.tinypic.com/j669gx.png[/img]
[img]http://s4.postimage.org/31ieldkkk/webclient.png[/img] [url=http://bit.ly/1TcRZ5g][b]Play now![/b][/url] [img]http://diverity.net/Themes/RedFox/images/devteam.gif[/img] [url=http://salusscape.eu/forum/][b]Forums + Updates[/b][/url]
[CENTER][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/wi7LWdM.png[/img]
[img]http://i.gyazo.com/2a2556ee3db2fd9bf45b4543d1771a35.png[/img]
[SIZE=4]Weekly Updates[/SIZE]
[SIZE=4]Fully Working Bank Tabs[/SIZE]
[SIZE=4]A New Better Bank-PIN System[/SIZE]
[SIZE=4]A Fully Working Advanced Bank Search System[/SIZE]
[SIZE=4]New 07 Items Such As The Armadyl Crossbow, Kraken Tentacle, Staff of Dead, Occult Necklace, Trident of the Seas & More. [/SIZE]
[SIZE=4]New Pre-EOC Items Such as Statius's, Vesta, Divine and Elysian Spirit Shield's & More.[/SIZE]
[SIZE=4]Drygore Items, E.G. Drygore Rapier, From RS3.[/SIZE]
[SIZE=4]Loach's, Which Changes Your Spell Book By Clicking On It.[/SIZE]
[SIZE=4]Skill-Seals Which Gives You More Exp In Any Other Skill.[/SIZE]
[SIZE=4]Unique Duo Slayer Events Every 50 Minutes (With Store)[/SIZE]
[SIZE=4]New Developed Skill Called Creation[/SIZE]
[SIZE=4]Dungeoneering Mini-Game With Chaotic Rewards[/SIZE]
[SIZE=4]Over 10+ Boss Pets, All Fully Working[/SIZE]
[SIZE=4]23 Working Skills [/SIZE]
[SIZE=4]Over 10+ Bosses, Including New Bosses Like Castillo, Giant Sea Snake, Sea Troll Queen & Icelord [/SIZE]
[SIZE=4]Fully Working Bounty Hunter System, With Mysterious Emblem's (T1-10) [/SIZE]
[SIZE=4]A Reliable Staff Team With Proffesional Coders[/SIZE]
[SIZE=4]Proffesional Looking HiScores W/ Many Feautures[/SIZE]
[SIZE=4]Active Community, With ALWAYS Over 20+ Players Online, Normally 25-50 Players[/SIZE]
[SIZE=4]Active Forums, With Over 700+ Members Registered[/SIZE]
[SIZE=4]And, Much More Content. Go Check It Out Yourself! [/SIZE]
[video]https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=IgAaEL_bPmw[/video]
[IMG]http://i60.tinypic.com/z4wtz.png[/img]
[SPOILER=Pictures][/SPOILER][IMG]http://i59.tinypic.com/eooyr.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i61.tinypic.com/10sg6qu.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i58.tinypic.com/34zek1y.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i57.tinypic.com/1zduon6.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i61.tinypic.com/5cm592.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i61.tinypic.com/35k25vl.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i57.tinypic.com/t8rwg3.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i59.tinypic.com/5z1tsl.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i62.tinypic.com/rbcjeb.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i61.tinypic.com/oa40hd.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i60.tinypic.com/n38dfn.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i60.tinypic.com/esq1yb.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i58.tinypic.com/64l3bn.png[/img]
[/CENTER]
[SIZE=5]Old advertisement[/SIZE]
[center]
[b][SIZE=4]Because of the latest updates, you must have the latest client to be able to connect![/size][/b] [b][SIZE=3]We have double experience weekend, double pk points monday & double slayer points tuesday![/SIZE][/b]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/jeDJpN6.gif[/img]
[img]http://i.gyazo.com/5c81fd79f4b8c2dbb441294e8c67b12a.png[/img]
[img]http://i.gyazo.com/d5c1d0092703839ff4c84fdaf762eabb.gif[/img]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/BLDGB0F.png[/img]
[img]http://diverity.net/Themes/default/images/PlayNow.png[/img][url=http://www.salusscape.org/launcher.jar] Play Now[/url] [url=https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/38026425/Client_2.rar] Play Now 2[/url] [img]http://diverity.net/Themes/RedFox/images/admin/modifications.gif[/img][url=http://www.salusscape.eu/competitie] Join the Lottery[/url] [url=http://"#linkhere"] Update Logs[/url] [url=http://www.salusscape.eu/forum] Register on Forums[/url] [url=http://www.salusscape.eu/vote] Vote For Free Donator Status [/url] [url=http://www.salusscape.eu/highscores] Highscores [/url]
[/ADMIN]
[b]Account security![/b] [img]http://i.gyazo.com/928b3c52a258784e657559f84fc8414a.png[/img]
[B]Dungeoneering till 120![/B] [img]http://i.gyazo.com/77df9c74d17313c9403ecf8f947b0324.png[/img]
[img]http://i.gyazo.com/bb57790585c1891b92887281fdc45f2b.png[/img]
[img]http://i.gyazo.com/07dc03ce702bc9b5aafd81f2145e0d22.gif[/img]
[b]Achievements[/b] [img]http://i.gyazo.com/68ba49f4155d3045f0014504839ca8a7.png[/img]
[b]Active forums[/b] [img]http://i.gyazo.com/a137e67ff5da0eba13f33e30a1f82878.png[/img]
[b]Boss pets![/b] [img]http://i.gyazo.com/1f7987380c870b99274b4630d3ed7905.png[/img]
[b]Introduction[/b] This basically means there's no spawning and any items people obtain will have been earned through PVM or PKing. This means our items will have value, making everything more fun, giving players something to aim for and of course making it so much better when you finally get that kill for rare items. There are tons of different ways to exchange your items including specific market areas, clan chats, and even a dedicated section on forums. Being a new server we want to get our economy right the first time. To ensure we achieve this we have made drop rates at a perfect level to maintain item drops for PvMers, but also to give just enough that we're not flooded with items and massive inflation like you see on most other private servers.
[ADMIN=Reviews]
[/admin]
[b]Skill-Points[/b] Hate to train some skills? No problem! We have found a solution. When you level, you'll gain skill points. With these points you can level up other skills. How awesome is that!? [img]http://i.gyazo.com/1294a01d31286b54de28a769e6c7a11b.png[/img]
[b]PvM[/b] Did the other monsters get boring? And do you want a chaotic weapon? Try our new monsters that will drop them! They also drop new bones. These bones are way better than dragon bones! [img]http://i.gyazo.com/1be38074a9687e79315f583b90b50808.png[/img]
[img]http://[IMG]http://i.gyazo.com/953a8d1a8fb9bf6b391787096392e94c.png[/img][/img]
[b]PvP[/b] Our server is mainly based on PvP. So that is very important and is one of many that we focus the most on. [img]http://i.gyazo.com/2293317096f08c3603498eaf1dfc81e8.png[/img]
[img]http://i.gyazo.com/c7d41fc173c188e479a562acfd5d0304.png[/img]
[b]Skilling[/b] We notice that on alot of servers that you miss something when training a skill. It is not rewarding, however we have made it that it is! At the end, you'll be a rich man just because you trained your skills.
[b]Clan Chats[/b] Want someone to chat with? Make your own clan to dominate other clans? We have this feature! [img]http://i.gyazo.com/827ccf13f22f85e9c94046c08ab88306.png[/img]
[b]Creation Skill[/b] We've come up with a new skill. The creation skill. When you get a plan as a drop, you'll be able to make a weapon with that plan. How higher the skill, the better weapons you can create. Here are some plans.. [img]http://i.gyazo.com/fbbffe35bc68852c8373df0a77489bcb.png[/img]
[b]Other ways to get money[/b] You can get tasks. These tasks will get you some money when completed. Don't worry, they aren't hard and are worth the time! A good way to get money when you love skilling! [img]http://i.gyazo.com/b03b3eb94c268fdfd70781e49a8488da.png[/img]
[b]Daily Tasks & Free Daily Spins[/b] You don't do daily tasks for nothing, it gives good rewards for the time spent.[img]http://i.gyazo.com/de28e9fddc46190057ca37ed24802c01.png[/img]
[b]Voting rewards[/b] Don't want to spend alot of money with donating? And you want the full benefits that a bronze donator has? You can basically get it for ever, without even spending a penny! [img]http://i.gyazo.com/61269ff34e0918c3f6f24042b112eb18.png[/img]
[b]Prestige System[/b] Want to make some money, pk-ing points and squeal of fortune tickets? Then you can try our Prestige System. You only have to max out your combat skills. There are actually 250 prestiges. The points you get is: prestige * 1! How awesome is that? [img]http://i.gyazo.com/612cd899db7189c0d9a0e2df6403eaaa.png[/img]
[b]Godwars[/b] You'll have to gather some friends to slay the bosses in Godwars. Saradomin, Armadyl, Bandos & Zamorak [img]http://i.gyazo.com/43068276b00584323fd5dbc29cd1ba93.png[/img]
[/center]

Introduction
This basically means there’s no spawning and any items people obtain will have been earned through PVM or PKing. This means our items will have value, making everything more fun, giving players something to aim for and of course making it so much better when you finally get that kill for rare items. There are tons of different ways to exchange your items including specific market areas, clan chats, and even a dedicated section on forums. Being a new server we want to get our economy right the first time. To ensure we achieve this we have made drop rates at a perfect level to maintain item drops for PvMers, but also to give just enough that we’re not flooded with items and massive inflation like you see on most other private servers.

[ADMIN=Reviews]

[/admin]

Skill-Points
Hate to train some skills? No problem! We have found a solution. When you level, you’ll gain skill points. With these points you can level up other skills. How awesome is that!?

PvM
Did the other monsters get boring? And do you want a chaotic weapon? Try our new monsters that will drop them! They also drop new bones. These bones are way better than dragon bones!

[/img]

PvP
Our server is mainly based on PvP. So that is very important and is one of many that we focus the most on.

Skilling
We notice that on alot of servers that you miss something when training a skill. It is not rewarding, however we have made it that it is! At the end, you’ll be a rich man just because you trained your skills.

Clan Chats
Want someone to chat with? Make your own clan to dominate other clans? We have this feature!

Creation Skill
We’ve come up with a new skill. The creation skill. When you get a plan as a drop, you’ll be able to make a weapon with that plan. How higher the skill, the better weapons you can create. Here are some plans…

Other ways to get money
You can get tasks. These tasks will get you some money when completed. Don’t worry, they aren’t hard and are worth the time! A good way to get money when you love skilling!

Daily Tasks & Free Daily Spins
You don’t do daily tasks for nothing, it gives good rewards for the time spent.

Voting rewards
Don’t want to spend alot of money with donating? And you want the full benefits that a bronze donator has? You can basically get it for ever, without even spending a penny!

Prestige System
Want to make some money, pk-ing points and squeal of fortune tickets? Then you can try our Prestige System. You only have to max out your combat skills. There are actually 250 prestiges. The points you get is: prestige * 1! How awesome is that?

Godwars
You’ll have to gather some friends to slay the bosses in Godwars. Saradomin, Armadyl, Bandos & Zamorak
